spells.name: Anti-Incorporeal Shell
spells.description: Incorporeal creatures stay 10 ft. away from you.

spells.name: Bloatbomb
spells.description: Kill a weak creature and turn its corpse into an explosive trap.

spells.name: Enchantment Foil
spells.description: Trick opponents who try to cast enchantments on you.

spells.name: Guardian of Faith
spells.description: Target is protected by shield of faith and a protection spell, and can transfer the effects to another creature.

spells.name: Path of Glory, Greater
spells.description: Create an expanding glow that heals allies within it of 5 hp of damage.

spells.name: Persistent Vigor
spells.description: Gain fast healing 2, immunity to bleed, and faster recovery from diseases and poisons.

spells.name: Shield of Fortification
spells.description: Target gains a 50% chance to treat critical hits and sneak attacks as normal hits.

spells.name: Spellcrash, Lesser
spells.description: Target loses a 3rd-level prepared spell or spell slot.
